languages.text: "Гибель остатков Азуриани на мире, покрытом лесами, была предсказуема. Рано или поздно, но без своей скорлупы-корабля они были обречены".
"The demise of the Asuryani remnants on the forested world was predictable. Without their craftshell, they were doomed to perish sooner or later."
languages.original_text: "Гибель остатков Азуриани на мире, покрытом лесами, была предсказуема. Рано или поздно, но без своей скорлупы-корабля они были обречены".

traits.locale_text: "The demise of the Asuryani remnants on the forested world was predictable. Without their craftshell, they were doomed to perish sooner or later."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: “方舟灵族的残部在那个森林世界消亡，这完全是意料之中的事情。失去方舟的保护之后，他们迟早都会灭亡。”
languages.original_text: "The demise of the Asuryani remnants on the forested world was predictable. Without their craftshell, they were doomed to perish sooner or later."

traits.locale_text: “方舟灵族的残部在那个森林世界消亡，这完全是意料之中的事情。失去方舟的保护之后，他们迟早都会灭亡。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « La destruction des vestiges asuryanis sur le monde forestier était prévisible. Sans leur vaisseau, ils étaient de toute façon condamnés à mourir. »
languages.original_text: "The demise of the Asuryani remnants on the forested world was predictable. Without their craftshell, they were doomed to perish sooner or later."

traits.locale_text: « La destruction des vestiges asuryanis sur le monde forestier était prévisible. Sans leur vaisseau, ils étaient de toute façon condamnés à mourir. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: «La muerte de los restos Asuryani en el mundo bosque era predecible. Sin su astronave, estaban condenados a morir tarde o temprano».
languages.original_text: "The demise of the Asuryani remnants on the forested world was predictable. Without their craftshell, they were doomed to perish sooner or later."

traits.locale_text: «La muerte de los restos Asuryani en el mundo bosque era predecible. Sin su astronave, estaban condenados a morir tarde o temprano».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「森に覆われた星のアシュリヤーニの残党が滅びることは予測できた。クラフトシェルがなければ、遅かれ早かれ滅びる運命にあったんだ」
languages.original_text: "The demise of the Asuryani remnants on the forested world was predictable. Without their craftshell, they were doomed to perish sooner or later."

traits.locale_text: 「森に覆われた星のアシュリヤーニの残党が滅びることは予測できた。クラフトシェルがなければ、遅かれ早かれ滅びる運命にあったんだ」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Der Niedergang der überlebenden Asuryani auf der bewaldeten Welt war vorhersehbar. Ohne ihre Weltenhülle waren sie dazu verdammt, früher oder später zu sterben."
languages.original_text: "The demise of the Asuryani remnants on the forested world was predictable. Without their craftshell, they were doomed to perish sooner or later."

traits.locale_text: "Der Niedergang der überlebenden Asuryani auf der bewaldeten Welt war vorhersehbar. Ohne ihre Weltenhülle waren sie dazu verdammt, früher oder später zu sterben."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.original_text: "The demise of the Asuryani remnants on the forested world was predictable. Without their craftshell, they were doomed to perish sooner or later."

languages.text: "Ormanlık dünyadaki Asuryani kalıntılarının yok oluşu, tahmin edilebilir bir şeydi. Gemili dünyacıkları olmadan eninde sonunda yitip gideceklerdi."
languages.original_text: "The demise of the Asuryani remnants on the forested world was predictable. Without their craftshell, they were doomed to perish sooner or later."

traits.locale_text: "Ormanlık dünyadaki Asuryani kalıntılarının yok oluşu tahmin edilebilir bir şeydi. El işi kabukları olmadan eninde sonunda ortadan kaybolacaklardı zaten."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
